ygData.subject: RE: Instruments vs. Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t think it s the level, but the person playing.  you don t have to be a level 50 to be an ass.  guess we get a bad rap, but i try not to worry about what
ygData.messageBody:
i don't think it's the level, but the person playing. you don't have to be
a level 50 to be an ass. guess we get a bad rap, but i try not to worry
about what everyone thinks about us generally and just try to be a good
person in game.

anyway, as far as what to look forward to. for one, you have the variety of
using all songs available. second, you have the opportunity to group up and
adventure into any zone or dungeon. third, other than deep in high level
dungeons (unless grouped up), it is nice to be able to walk around freely
without worry from those nasties you always were looking over your shoulder
for.

Shada

> It's nice to
> have a goal, but right now, I think some of us see that goal as a bit
> darker for all that's been said.
>
> What can you tell us about 50th level that will make us want
> to achieve it?
>
> Talies the threadnazi
